content: today i m excited to share my written pattern for this super cute ruby crochet mini scarf/neckerchief i noticed a lack of crochet options compared to the considerable amount of knitting patterns for similar accessories so i decided to design one this mini scarf is incredibly versatile suitable for any season and complements a variety of outfits you can style it by wrapping it around your neck once like a neckerchief for a vintage look or twice for a bit more warmth depending on your outfit style and personal preference if you re a visual learner you can find a video tutorial on my youtube channel to complement this simplified written pattern https //youtu be/dsaerjtgthu skill level advanced beginner knowledge of basic stitches + half_double_crochet back loop only knowledge of easy techniques like increasing and decreasing supplies needed - 1 ball of cardiff cashmere classic from cardiff cashmere in colourway 662 or any sport yarn of your preference approximately 25 grams or 110 meters to make a 33 5-inch-long scarf stretched and not blocked - 3 5 mm crochet hook - yarn needle - tape measure - scissors - stitch markers my intention was to give you the option of making this cute accessory by purchasing only one ball of yarn considering that cashmere can be quite pricey nevertheless the scarf is highly adaptable allowing you to easily crochet it to a longer length if desired should you choose to make a longer scarf you ll of course need more yarn cardiff cashmere offers a variety of color combinations so feel free to check their website out and find the nearest shop in your area https //cardiffcashmere it/en there is no shipping charge for this item as it is a pdf file and can be downloaded immediately after your purchase ps i ve created the design from start to end so please don t copy that by purchasing you agree not to distribute the pattern in any way for free or for sale if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished products as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer on your social media and provide a link to my shop if you re selling online if you have any doubts or questions feel free to contact me check out my website https //bloodimaryart com or follow me here → instagram https //www instagram com/bloodimaryart/ → facebook https //www facebook com/bloodimaryart → pinterest https //www pinterest com/bloodimaryart → tik tok https //www tiktok com/@bloodimaryart → youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucpmtxpub4a39ua8vsbyd0jq ★ if you wish to receive email updates regarding my new patterns discount codes and sales join my mailing list here https //mailchi mp/e0edd1d92d67/sign-up-form ★ thanks for visiting my shop
